metadata.dc:author: Martín, M C
Carranza, M A
Borrego, H
metadata.dc:description: The hamartomas that are located in the lingual region are very strange tumours. There are very few published in the world literature. A patient that presented a hamartoma was diagnosed and treated in our department.
metadata.dc:title: Hamartoma lingual. A propósito de un caso.
[Lingual hamartoma. Report of a case].
